info.description: Access the most exhaustive, accurate and up-to-date collection of global and hyper-local geocoded events and activities across a wide range of categories and genres
info.title: LotaData

parameters.description: List of required activity type ids (compliment to category)
parameters.name: activity

parameters.description: Matching on event and place names
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Text query matching titles, description, various text, tags, category
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Start on or after date specified (2015-10-16)
parameters.name: from_day

parameters.description: Start on or before date specified (2015-10-16)
parameters.name: to_day

parameters.description: Corner of a bounding box (lat,lng). Requires 0 or 2 pairs
parameters.name: bbox

parameters.description: Closed custom polygon. Ordered list of lat,lng pairs
parameters.name: polygon

parameters.description: Search within specified geopolitical place id
parameters.name: within

parameters.description: Return results starting at specified offset
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Return results starting at specified offset (summary, context, detail)
parameters.name: fieldset

items.description: Event Occurrence Detail limited to requested fieldset.

@type.description: Type of occurrence. You will usually see Organized as the type for most events. While Virtual events will get their own Virtual type.
Type of specific feature or Taxonomy node such as EventCategory, SportsTeam, Persona.

ambience.description: expected mood and feel of the event

@type.description: Type of specific feature or Taxonomy node such as EventCategory, SportsTeam, Persona.

at.description: Reference to the location where event takes place

@type.description: Type of place where Place is a physical address, LocalBusiness is any type of comercial property, AdministrativeArea is a political or colloquial area, and Virtual is out of this world

formatted.description: Address formatted for display as a single string

street.description: Street portion of the address, may sometimes be a common name of the place

@type.description: Type of specific feature or Taxonomy node such as EventCategory, SportsTeam, Persona.
Type of specific feature or Taxonomy node such as EventCategory, SportsTeam, Persona.

category.description: Associated EventCategory. May be multiple, such as Charity Music event

@type.description: Type of specific feature or Taxonomy node such as EventCategory, SportsTeam, Persona.

duration.description: Duration of the event in ISO-8601 format (PT45M) - 45 minutes

endApprox.description: endDate is approximated based on historical data

endDate.description: Time when the event ends, if known

extTaxonomy.description: extended taxonomy such as IAB and Google AdWords

@type.description: Type of specific feature or Taxonomy node such as EventCategory, SportsTeam, Persona.

genre.description: applicable Genres. (Tier 2 taxonomy). May include related genres from categories, not deemed as primary

@type.description: Type of specific feature or Taxonomy node such as EventCategory, SportsTeam, Persona.

headline.description: Optional short description in plain text

@type.description: Type of specific feature or Taxonomy node such as EventCategory, SportsTeam, Persona.

htmlDescription.description: Full description with HTML formatting, where available

@type.description: Type of specific feature or Taxonomy node such as EventCategory, SportsTeam, Persona.

name.description: Name of the event in plain text

noTime.description: Specific time of the event is unknown. (shown only when true)

onDemand.description: This event can start at any time during specified window

performer.description: List of Personas significant for this event

@type.description: Type of specific feature or Taxonomy node such as EventCategory, SportsTeam, Persona.

superEvent.description: Parent id, if this event is part of a series of a group

@type.description: Type of specific feature or Taxonomy node such as EventCategory, SportsTeam, Persona.

query.description: Specific filters understood and executed for this query. If your parameter is not visible here, then consult the documentation for correct usage.

limit.description: maximum number of matches to return

stats.description: Shows invocation details about the query. Running query again, could produce different results

fieldset.description: Specific fields returned by this query

runtime.description: Server side run time in msec for this request

get.summary: Find event occurrences in the area. Returns results at specific place and time, event groups are expanded for every occurrence.
